job_title: Project Management with Data Quality management (DQM) & Data Governance
jd: From: Venkat, KK Software Associates venkat@kksoftwareassociates.com Reply to: venkat@kksoftwareassociates.com We are hiring Project Management with Data Quality management (DQM) & Data Governance for one of my Client in Location: Raleigh, NC interesting candidates please send resumes to venkat@kksoftwareassociates.com (614) 335-4419 Position: Project Management with Data Quality management (DQM) & Data GovernanceLocation: Raleigh, NCVisa status: : Strictly Don’t share F1, OPT, OPT EAD, L2 EAD and H4 EAD work permit Strong Knowledge of Data Governance, Data Quality and Data Management principles and conceptsExpert at analyzing and modeling data using MS Excel, Access, SQL, and/or other data analytical and visualization tools (Spotfire, Qlikview, Tableau, PowerBI).Skilled at turning business data requirements into robust data quality rules.Adept at developing robust data quality scorecards for senior management.Ability to manage projects, partner, and collaborate with cross functional stakeholders.Ability to assist and support detailed analysis and propose decisions.Understanding of data warehousing and transformation methods, lineage documentation, and ETL processes.Subject matter knowledge of BSA regulation, bank operations/systems and/or financial services
